oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Sgt. Joel Lindsey and Catherine Beaty Reagan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Joel Lindsey Reagan, Co. D, 1st Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA enlisted in 1863 from Little Crab, Fentress County, Tenn. He returned to Little Crab after the war and later joined the Grand Army of the Republic. He married Catherine Beaty Reagan on February 22, 1866. This is a post Civil War copy print of the couple. He died Nov. 24, 1920 and she died February 21, 1922. The regiment was recruited among Union men in Middle Tennessee and they spent much of the war on anti-guerrilla activity.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lindsey, Joel; Reagan, Catherine Beaty
